programme.title: Darkest Night
programme.desc: Elizabeth and her group of witches have their entire kindred in their pockets, Ngozi, her daughter is gifted with the gift of seeing, and she is out to expose them all.

programme.title: My Servant
programme.desc: All the princesses in a palace wants the cook Benji, for keeps, but all hell break loose when the king finds out that he has gotten his three daughters pregnant.

programme.title: The Writers Wife
programme.desc: Mimi, a married woman decides to act single and fall in love with Kelvin after being starved of attention by her husband who is a writer.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Arunma gets a new position, and Ijeawele confesses. Ejike faces the King of Ajaani.

programme.title: Ghetto Princess
programme.desc: Obieze will do anything to take the throne forcefully from his father, but his character throws him out of the palace earlier as the throne stays shaky.

programme.title: Royal Mistake
programme.desc: A crowned prince of Umunoku kingdom struggles to manage his desires, leading to a fateful encounter that results in a commoner becoming pregnant.

programme.title: Blind Husband
programme.desc: Koko gives everything to Fred to get rich, now he is married to Lucy, but Koko has promised to give him a pound of her flesh. He is either married to her or no one else.

programme.title: To Love Selena
programme.desc: Love, betrayal, and obsession collide when Selena, Derrick, Oscar, and Precious are trapped in a web of passion that could crumble their families forever.

programme.title: My Verdict
programme.desc: Betrayed and dying, Olivia exposes Mias deadly plot to save her unborn child, leaving Ken to face a lifetime of regret.

programme.title: The City Wife
programme.desc: A village tailor arrives in the city to celebrate Christmas with his educated and successful fiancee, but he is shamed and sent out as she plans for her celebrity wedding.

programme.title: The Village Girl I Love
programme.desc: Adugo and Benson are madly in love, but this is disrupted by Bensons mum who makes sure that she ends the relationship and propose another woman to her son.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: A lady vows never to give love a chance anymore, but the pressure from her mum says otherwise. She decides to bring a man to act as her husband but everything changes for him.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Another life is claimed in Ofu-Obodo. Mazi Ofor has to swear to his innocence.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Eze Dibia shows his human side. Chizitaram seeks forgiveness from the people she has wronged.

programme.title: On My Honour
programme.desc: A king couldnt get his wife pregnant, so they decide to have Ure as their surrogate mum, then the unthinkable happens.

programme.title: Heart Of A Princess
programme.desc: A Princess with a good heart is treated with hate by her father because of her good heart. After she gets married to Chuma, the hate increased because he is an hairdresser.

programme.title: Transgression
programme.desc: Magnus lives a reckless life that eventually leads him to a woman who infects him with HIV. But after his diagnosis, everything changes.

programme.title: Once Married
programme.desc: Jessica leaves her abusive husband, only to face the same pain from other men. Now she must fight for her peace and prepare for love again with the help of her son Derrick.

programme.title: Crippled Ego
programme.desc: Chugo turns down all the suitor that comes to her, but the proud prince of Omanbala swears by the gods that he must marry her.

programme.title: When Wrong Feels Right
programme.desc: Brian and Jane ignore genetic warnings and marry for love until their childs struggle with sickle cell forces them to face the painful cost of their choice.

programme.title: But Why Her
programme.desc: Freds attitude to life is crazy, and he takes it from his father. Without correction he gets worse and his mother is up against his father sleeping with their maid.

programme.title: Bata
programme.desc: A wealthy young man, known for his generosity to friends, is tragically murdered and his wife and elder brother are being blamed for his death.

programme.title: The Octopus
programme.desc: Mr. Octopus will go any length to pull the princess of Umu Chukwu down, this moves blackmails the princess and hopes to destroy the kings family.

programme.title: Devils Desire
programme.desc: Eric had a thing with his wifes friend Toki, now she tries to scheme her way into the house through all means possible.

programme.title: Enakhe
programme.desc: AIG escalates things. Archie gains the upper hand. Enakhe stays cool under pressure.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Iya Oviyon shocks Senami. Mausi discovers she is uncured. The villagers of Jegba show that they mean business.

programme.title: The River
programme.desc: Love and blood bonds are tested when two separate worlds dramatically collide., as greed and betrayal rule the worlds of the wealthy businessmen and exploited township inhabitants.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: The Flatmates reunite with Sammy, sharing stories and updates, rekindling their friendship.

programme.title: Hustle

programme.title: Colour of the Loyalty
programme.desc: A triad boss elite guards are tasked with protecting him from assassination. As one guard witnesses the elimination of other triad bosses, he unravels a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Bruce Lee, My Brother
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee biopic as told by his younger brother Robert. Following Bruce Lees journey from a defiant youth in Hong Kong to his global triumph as an 18-year-old in the USA.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Madam Fong leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the HK Deputy Commissioner of Police.

programme.title: The Inspector Wear Skirt II
programme.desc: In this sequel, the female police squad members struggle to blend in with the new recruits, and must also join the Special Duty Unit to capture an escaped prisoner.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu. Guan must fight for Cao but is allowed to escort Lius concubine to safety, in a dangerous journey.

programme.title: Life Without Principle
programme.desc: A criminal, a bank officer and a cop are forced to abandon their morals and principles to solve their financial problems.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey Of A Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, from an early age and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains.

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Two bumbling cops must retrieve a roll of film containing the criminal evidence against a drug cartel from the informants girlfriend, Rosa, to track down the gangsters.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: A skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world must return to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, three disciples undergo rigorous training to avenge the death of the Dragon Gate Master by defeating the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Iceman
programme.desc: An imperial guard framed for treason is buried with three guards during a battle and kept frozen. Unearthed 400 years later in modern times, their battle continues.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: An underground boxer loses his memory while escaping from the Bangkok triad. When he regains his memory after starting anew, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: In this classic martial arts comedy, Sammo Hung stars as Lam Sai Wing, the disciple of Wong Fei Hung, who gets embroiled in a feud with a rival kung fu school.

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: A young man evades an arranged marriage to go to Shaolin Temple, where he joins other disciples to fight against an expelled disciple taking revenge on the Abbot.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of the Whampoa Military Training School. While there, they accidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan, putting their lives in danger.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Dr Lam diagnoses the latest phenomenon as more citizens become infected. He decides to stop the vampires from turning more citizens.

programme.title: Bullets Over Summer
programme.desc: Two unorthodox and reckless detectives who use a demented grannys apartment as a stakeout location develop romantic relationships with her neighbours.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: Yu Xiang and Tong Tong move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. Dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really is as it seems.

programme.title: Legacy Of Rage
programme.desc: Brandon Lee, the son of Bruce Lee, stars as Brandon Ma - a man seeking revenge on his friend, Michael, who frames him for his own crime and steals the love of his life.

programme.title: 3AM The Driver
programme.desc: A taxi driver who judges others by his own standards sets out to help victims in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he tries to help her.

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Bruce Lee, My Brother
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee biopic as told by his younger brother Robert. Following Bruce Lees journey from a defiant youth in Hong Kong to his global triumph as an 18-year-old in the USA.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Tiger Cage III
programme.desc: James and John jointly look into a case of which the suspect is an influential rich businessman. James girlfriend, Suki, has an integral role in the case.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A retired boxer tries to help a new student who is being targeted by bullies.

programme.title: The Sniper
programme.desc: A police sniper teams up with a hot-headed rookie to take down his former friend and teammate who is exacting revenge on the police.

programme.title: Butterfly Lovers
programme.desc: Loosely based on the Butterfly Lovers legend, this is the tragic love story between Zhu Yan Zhi and her martial arts senior, Liang Zhong Shan.

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: When a Hong Kong policewoman, a Japanese detective and a security officer foil a plane hijacking attempt, they incur the wrath of the hijackers who are out for vengeance.

programme.title: The Tigers
programme.desc: Five cops find their careers and their lives in jeopardy when they accept a 10 million dollar bribe from a drug smuggler, to release him from custody during a drug bust.

programme.title: Eclats De Vie
programme.desc: Lidylle entre une jeune artiste et lheritier dune famille fortunee, qui doit lutter pour imposer ses choix face son entourage, fait resurgir de lourds secrets.

programme.desc: Trois jeunes femmes ambitieuses creent une agence de mannequin. Le succs de leur entreprise attire lattention dun homme lie aux cartels de la drogue.

programme.desc: Mre de deux filles, une femme pauvre veut utiliser la beaute de sa cadette pour devenir riche et celbre. Mais le destin va lui jouer des tours.

programme.desc: Veronica et Gaston sont fous de joie. Quant Francisca, elle nen croit pas ses oreilles.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: Set in 1970s New York City, this mob drama led by Melissa McCarthy, Tiffany Haddish, and Elisabeth Moss sees the wives of gangsters run their husbands rings after theyre jailed.

programme.title: Destroyer
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman is a tour-de-force in this gritty crime drama. A beaten-down LAPD detective who went undercover in a gang must return to that dark world that broke her.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: A refreshing take on the horror movie genre. Scream sees the residents of a small-town call on the cardinal rules of slasher flicks when confronted with a real-life horror situation.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Ben Affleck stars in this tense crime drama from the director of Ronin. A small-time crook takes on the identity of a criminal and soon becomes overwhelmed by his stolen life.

programme.title: The Day We Didnt Meet
programme.desc: A great South African film. Alex and Sam reconnect after a chance encounter. They imagine a fantasy life together and abandon all their responsibilities. However, reality sets in.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?
programme.desc: Richard Gere and Jennifer Lopez set the dance floor alight in this romcom. A lawyer, bored with his life, spontaneously takes up dance classes, something that changes him.

programme.title: Ella And The Little Sorcerer
programme.desc: A charming fantasy animation. When Prince Alex is trapped in the body of a mouse, Ella and her friends set off on a journey to find the magic that can change him back.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild!
programme.desc: The Rugrats and the Thornberrys merge for a joint adventure on a rickety boat that gets them marooned on a desert island.

programme.title: Khumba
programme.desc: A proudly South African animation with the voice talents of Liam Neeson and Laurence Fishburne. A half-striped zebra embarks on an inspirational journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Happy Feet 2
programme.desc: Elijah Wood and the late Robin Williams star in this touching sequel. A young penguin struggles to find himself but faces his fears when his colony is threatened.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Megan Fox and Will Arnett star in this action-packed reboot of the 90s kids classic. When the city of New York is threatened, its up to four mutated turtles to protect it.

programme.title: Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: The mischievous penguins from the Madagascar franchise get their own movie. Skipper and his crew join forces with an undercover agency to take down an evil villain.

programme.title: Schuks! Your Country Needs You
programme.desc: Leon Schuster is back in elaborate costumes and makeup to wreak havoc across the country by testing the limits of South Africans in completely bizarre situations.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson returns as the bumbling secret agent and takes on another mission. He must stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a world leader.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Director Michael Mann (Heat) teams up with Golden Globe winner Colin Farrell and Oscar winner Jamie Foxx to reboot the 80s classic crime show about Miamis top vice detectives.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Ashley Judd fights for her innocence in this crime thriller. A woman wrongfully convicted for her husbands murder discovers that he is still alive. Can she get her revenge?

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Proving you cant keep a good horror franchise down, Scream 2 is set two years after the tragic events at Woodsboro, when a movie based on the murders sparks the killers return.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A humourous satire about TV rating wars. A TV ratings computer malfunctions, inaccurately reporting that the audience prefers public television.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars as a psychopathic bisexual murderer in this period thriller set in late 1950s New York. Ripley heads to Europe to retrieve a millionaire playboy.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: This adorable movie earned multiple Oscar nominations, including for Best Picture. A farm piglet embarks on a career in sheepherding, with some surprising and spectacular results.

programme.title: Richard The Stork
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation about staying true to yourself. Even though everyone thinks hes a sparrow, Richard is convinced hes a stork and is determined to fly to Africa.

programme.title: Space Dogs: Adventure To The Moon
programme.desc: Follow the adventure of a canine astronaut as he travels out of space in search of his lost father.

programme.title: Over The Hedge
programme.desc: Bruce Willis leads a great cast in this animation. A raccoon con-artist meets a group of animals who must now adapt to suburbia after their home is uprooted by humans.

programme.title: The Cat In The Hat
programme.desc: Based on the beloved childrens book, a brother and sister at home alone are visited by a talking cat who opens them up to a whole new world of fun.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out...
programme.sub-title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: The four mutant brothers return for a thrilling sequel. Once again, they face Shredder, but this time, he has interdimensional help.

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: Charlie Hunnam and Idris Elba fight to cancel the apocalypse in this in this blockbuster. Giant robots fight to defend humanity from giant monsters trying to destroy Earth.

programme.title: Cradle 2 The Grave
programme.desc: Jet Li plays a Taiwanese intelligence officer who teams up with a thief for a rescue operation in this slick action crime thriller from the director of Romeo Must Die.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson (Avengers) stars in this pulsating action film. A woman accidentally absorbs an experimental drug during a black-market deal and is turned into a killing machine.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie Pitt and James McAvoy push their bodies to the limit in this action blockbuster based on the hit comic book series about a secret league of superhuman assassins.

programme.title: Snakehead
programme.desc: A high-octane action movie. A Chinese immigrant gets caught up in an international crime ring of human smuggling while attempting to make a better life for her family.

programme.title: The Goldfinch
programme.desc: A book-inspired drama about a young boy who lost his mother in a terrorist attack. He has a coveted painting stolen before the tragedy as a memento of his mothers death.

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: Two weeks shy of his wedding, a socially awkward guy enters into a charade by hiring the owner of a company that provides best men for grooms in need.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: After a painful breakup with her long-term boyfriend, successful lobbyist Leah Vaughn jumps into a passionate relationship with a charming stranger, Carter, who seems to be the perfect guy.

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: An up and coming black business executive with a wife and child becomes the obsession of a new white temp in his office.

programme.title: Marilyn Monroe: Beauty Is Pain
programme.desc: Marilyn Monroe is easily the most iconic woman of 20th Century Hollywood, from hot pink gowns to an iconic white dress flying towards the sky over a subway grate, .

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: Samantha Mackenzie is hoping to experience life away from home and her parents as she leaves for college.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think hes finally found the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: On the first day at his new school, Cameron instantly falls for Bianca the gorgeous girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet light up the screen in this unforgettable tale of forbidden love and courage set against the ill-fated maiden voyage of the unsinkable Titanic.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word he speaks.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Seeking a way to save their doomed world, a crew of tiny, human-looking aliens arrives on Earth in the perfect disguise a spaceship shaped like an ordinary man.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: A financial executive who cant stop his career down spiral is invited into his daughters imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Queen Latifah is New Yorks fastest cabbie, whose skills behind the wheel and souped-up car help an overeager undercover cop pursue a gang of female bank robbers.

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Georgia, after discovering her terminal illness, she quits her job and sets out on a luxurious trip to Europe.

programme.title: Sex And The City 2
programme.desc: Its been two years since Carrie Bradshaw and Big tied the knot and between wild passion and a baby, they are feeling a little too much like Mr. and Mrs. Married!

programme.title: Monster-In-Law
programme.desc: Engaged to marry Kevin, Charlie has second thoughts after meeting his overbearing mother, who thinks no girl is good enough for her Kevin, and especially not Charlie.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: After a painful breakup with her long-term boyfriend, successful lobbyist Leah Vaughn jumps into a passionate relationship with a charming stranger, Carter, who seems to be the perfect guy.

programme.title: You Dont Mess With The Zohan
programme.desc: A Mossad agent fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

programme.title: Nothing To Lose
programme.desc: Nicks wifes in bed with his boss. He later gets a gun to his head by a carjacker but steps on the gas pedal. They end up friends after adventures together

programme.title: Jamie Foxx: Secret To Success
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the life and career of veteran actor Jamie Foxx. From starting out in comedy to Oscar wins and nominations, Foxxs career has been nothing short of success.

programme.title: Marley and Me
programme.desc: Marley and Me is the heartwarming and unforgettable story of a family in the making and the wondrously neurotic dog who taught them what really matters in life.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Thousands of lives are at stake as ordinary heroes try to stop a runaway train transporting toxic chemicals in this action-thriller starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine!

programme.title: War Of The Worlds
programme.desc: An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

programme.title: Jumanji: Izinga Elilandelayo
programme.desc: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they discover that nothing is as they expect.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Far in the future, a young boy and his estranged father navigates an abandoned planet on which their space ship crashed.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Madea lands in the midst of mayhem when she spends a haunted Halloween fending off paranormal poltergeists, ghosts, and zombies while keeping a watchful eye on her wild teenage great-niece.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Madea, Bam, and Hattie venture to a haunted campground and the group must run for their lives when monsters, goblins, and the boogey man are unleashed.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.

programme.title: Tammy
programme.desc: Tammy is having a bad day, and instead of finding comfort at home, she finds her husband getting comfortable with the neighbor in her own house.

programme.title: Sex And The City 2
programme.desc: Its been two years since Carrie Bradshaw and Big tied the knot and between wild passion and a baby, they are feeling a little too much like Mr. and Mrs. Married!
